extendedInfo.description: iHandy Level (one of the 5 tools in iHandy Carpenter toolkit) is now for free! Take this chance to download!This might be the most beautiful and accurate level you can get in hand. Unlike some other levels in Android Market, this one is fully functional with calibration capability. It's accurate after calibrated.**********************************************iHandy Carpenter is on sale now, you are able to get all the 5 tools in one app today at discounted price!Check it out!**********************************************Enjoy!*** IMPORTANT MESSAGE. PLEASE READ ***Because the sensor inside every individual device could be built slightly differently, to make the level more accurate for your device, you need to calibrate before use.To calibrate:1. Find a flat surface.2. Hold your device upright , put the bottom edge of the device on the flat surface, then press Calibrate button (the one with a target image on it) to calibrate the portrait mode.3. Turn your device 90 degree clockwise , again keep it upright, and put the current bottom edge (long edge) on the flat surface, then press Calibrate button to calibrate the landscape mode.4. Put the back of the device against the surface, then press Calibration button to calibrate the face-up mode5. You are ready to go!

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Cant think of anything else this would need to do or add. Though maybe a compass utilizing GPS functions would the the topper. No problems and fast response.
reviews.author: Clinton Ruth

reviews.title: Its a little off
reviews.comment: It is not accurate but I still gave it 3 stars because I get the feeling its my phone is off, not the app. Maybe it will work for your phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good app
reviews.comment: Seems to work pretty good, but crashes occasionally.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smoother than the rest
reviews.comment: Needs more features like a beep when level. The graphics are smoother & more accurate once calibrated. UI is obviously beautiful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I manage to do a camber alignment on my car with this, only off by 0.1 degree when I went to the actual shop to make an official alignment
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Electricians
reviews.comment: What an amazingly fun an accurate tool. thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect on Galaxy Grand Duos
reviews.comment: Pretty cool app! Thanks a lot for this, it\'s very useful for non prof and prof things!
reviews.author: Wilker Foureaux

reviews.title: Great for free
reviews.comment: Great app. Nice easy calibration. Would like a button to disable screen rotate in app, for 45degree ish measurements.
reviews.author: Steve King

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Nice to have in a bind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it works
reviews.comment: Have used this app multiple times when hanging pictures...worked great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not correct.  Off by 3 degrees.
reviews.comment: Not correct.  Off by 3 degrees on my S4.
reviews.author: John Griffith

reviews.title: iHandy Level
reviews.comment: Looks good, works well. For some reason it pops up saying crashed, force close, when I\'m not even running it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is 1 awesome app ... Works perfect on my HTC EVO ....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t last for long
reviews.comment: Got stuck in one mode and won\'t go back to level.  Can\'t find instructions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really helped me out with the recent bedroom remodel!
reviews.author: Erik Klingenberg

reviews.title: Great little app..
reviews.comment: Especially useful for working out/on gradients for model railroads rather than having to pay out for expensive gradient tools that your only going to use from time to time!
reviews.author: Stu D\'Nutz

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: It shows the picture in portrait when my tablet is in landscape and vice versa.  That makes it pretty unusable.  Calibrating it didn\'t fix anything. Motorola Xoom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome app just in time...
reviews.comment: Awesome app! Just in time to hang and oak framed heavy mirror without having to go to my truck in the Texas heat, thank ya`ll! :-{]
reviews.author: Randy Baldwin

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: I used it today at work because I left my level at home. It\'s not very accurate, even when calibrated with an actual level.
reviews.author: Daniel Weidner

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: excellent
reviews.author: shoaib mughal
